Body:
Description: Hi Support, 

Customer is facing issue while deploying Eayslock on a pendrive. Please refer to the screenshot attached with this ticket. 
Tests performed by us:
- Format pendrive with NTFS and perform deployment again - Test failed.
- Disable "Client Presence Required" option from Global Settings and try opening on both PCs with or with out EPP client - Test failed on both. 

I request your assistance in resolving this issue. 

Thanks, 
Milan Singh

What We've Learned Updated: 06/05/2025

Client is facing issues with deploying the EasyLock on USB drives automatically.

Next Steps Updated: 06/05/2025
Sent note with instructions to check the proper settings.
